channel.title: Aryan def file
channel.description:
Def file for mopar's updater.
Copy the file into the tools/defs folder and edit the Update-Aryan.bat file - comment out the lines for downloading the defs off the mopar site. To do this, you should see two lines with wget in them, (with the mopar's site in the same line) comment these out by appending "rem" to the start and the two lines after it: [code] wget http://www.moparisthebest.com/defs/definitions.txt wget http://www.moparisthebest.com/defs/actionid-defs.txt move definitions.txt tools\defs\definitions.txt move actionid-defs.txt tools\defs\actionid-defs.txt [/code] TO: [code] rem wget http://www.moparisthebest.com/defs/definitions.txt rem wget http://www.moparisthebest.com/defs/actionid-defs.txt rem move definitions.txt tools\defs\definitions.txt rem move actionid-defs.txt tools\defs\actionid-defs.txt [/code] double click on Update-Aryan.bat and smile
Try not to leach.

item.title: Aryan def file
item.dc:creator: @Dr_Blunt_420 Dr_Blunt_420
item.description:
@Dr_Blunt_420 wrote:

hmm… this is what I tryed:
#define unknownInt2
set searchfile client.java
set pattern \s+int\s+\w+\s+= anInt\d+ >>\s+\d+;\n\s+\w+\s\w+\s= anInt\d+ >>\s+\d+;
set token 1
#exec

So why wouldent that work? I’ve been using a program called Regex Builder 1.10, It lets you load a file, and write a regex espression and then check the file for it. Now after re-reading that, I descided to try it again(and found out how to load the whole client in Regex Builder (don’t remember where I downloaded.) I’ll just try again next time, I guess, anyways, thanks for answering

Read full topic

item.title: Aryan def file
item.dc:creator: @BAsh BAsh
item.description:
@BAsh wrote:

Def file for mopar’s updater.

Copy the file into the tools/defs folder and edit the Update-Aryan.bat file - comment out the lines for downloading the defs off the mopar site. To do this, you should see two lines with wget in them, (with the mopar’s site in the same line) comment these out by appending “rem” to the start and the two lines after it:

wget http://www.moparisthebest.com/defs/definitions.txt
wget http://www.moparisthebest.com/defs/actionid-defs.txt
move definitions.txt tools\defs\definitions.txt
move actionid-defs.txt tools\defs\actionid-defs.txt

TO:

rem wget http://www.moparisthebest.com/defs/definitions.txt
rem wget http://www.moparisthebest.com/defs/actionid-defs.txt
rem move definitions.txt tools\defs\definitions.txt
rem move actionid-defs.txt tools\defs\actionid-defs.txt

double click on Update-Aryan.bat and smile

Try not to leach.

Read full topic
